name: Cs132-geometric-algorithms
body:
### Welcome to CS 132, Geometric Algorithms

Meeting Place: SCI 117

Meeting Time: TR 11 - 12:30

Instructor: Prof. Mark Crovella
* Office: MCS 140E
* Office Hours: M 3-4, T 3-4
* Email: crovella@bu.edu

TF: Mr. Qinxun Bai
* Office: MCS-208
* Office Hours: T 9-11, w 12-2
* Lab Tutoring Hours: TBD
* Email: qinxun@bu.edu

This course will introduce you to linear algebra from an algorithmic
standpoint.  More details are in the syllabus.

Course details, including readings, grading, and lecture schedule are in the syllabus, which is [here.](https://github.com/mcrovella/CS132-Geometric-Algorithms/blob/master/syllabus/syllabus.pdf?raw=true)

Lecture materials (in the form of ipython notebooks, as well as PDF versions) are [here,](https://github.com/mcrovella/CS132-Geometric-Algorithms) or can be downloaded en masse from the links above.  These will be updated as the semester progresses.

Online discussion takes place on Piazza.  The link for our class's Piazza discussion is [here.](https://piazza.com/bu/fall2015/cs132/home)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
